articles.title: WPK Praised by Russian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Youth Movement of the Workers' Party of Belgium on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Koochek Mehd, youth bureau member of the Youth Movement of the Workers' Party of Belgium, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea 
    Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam on Oct. 8 sent a message of greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea Obiang Nguema Mbasogo on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the independence of the country.
 The message sincerely wished the president bigger success in his noble work for the stability and prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Poses for Photograph with Delegates to Celebrations of WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Education Ministry Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Education headed by its Minister Kim Yong Jin Wednesday left here for China to participate in the 2nd Asian Educational Forum to be held in Beijing. 
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by Jon Kuk Man, vice-minister of Education, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
